publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2361 Mike Pringle: New Homes for Edinburgh—That the Parliament congratulates the City of Edinburgh Council for its proposals currently under development to build around 1,100 new homes, the first council homes to be built in Edinburgh in nearly 20 years, marking a major change in the city’s housing strategy for tackling the shortage of affordable housing and providing Edinburgh with homes that are badly needed. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Elaine Smith*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ross Finnie*, Jim Tolson*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-2361 New Homes for Edinburgh (lodged on 1 August 2008) Gil Paterson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Alex Neil*, Ian McKee*, Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2361 New Homes for Edinburgh (lodged on 1 August 2008) Keith Brown*
S3M-2361 New Homes for Edinburgh (lodged on 1 August 2008) Sandra White*
S3M-2361 New Homes for Edinburgh (lodged on 1 August 2008) Margaret Smith* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
